DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Flee from the specified targets if they are within the specified radius. This task will be considered complete when all entities have sucessfully fled.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>fleeFrom</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobjects</myType> <myLabel>Flee From</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllEntitiesFilter;required</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>radius</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Radius</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>50</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
